Detailed Description

Class that allows for creation of objects using RTTI.

This class provides a way to create instances of a new class using RTTI. It is necessary to reimplement this class for each class that can be loaded from a file or will be exported from a plug-in, so that the core is able to create instances of the class type. See the documentation of DzPlugin for a description of how to easily implement and provide class factories in a DAZ Studio plug-in.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzClassFactory::DzClassFactory ( QMetaObject const *  mo,
const DzGuid &  classID 
)

Create a new class factory with the given Qt meta object and DAZ class id.

Parameters:
mo Pointer to the static Qt meta object for the new class. All classes that have a DzClassFactory should be DzBase (and hence QObject) derived.
classID A four byte numeric identifier that is unique to the new class.

QObject **  obj,
const char *  className = NULL 
) [static, protected]
Parameters:
arg The argument to get a QObject pointer from.
obj A pointer to the QObject pointer that will receive the result.
className The name of the class that is expected the function will only succeed if the argument contains an object that inherits from the given type. If NULL, this function will succeed for objects of any type.
Returns:
true if the argument was successfully converted to a boolean value.

The name of the class type created by this factory.
QObject * DzClassFactory::createInstance (  )  const [pure virtual]

Create a new instance of the contained class using a default constructor that requires no arguments. Every class that wants to participate in file load/save must return a valid pointer from this method.

QObject * DzClassFactory::createInstance ( const QVariantList &  args  )  const [pure virtual]

Create a new instance of this class with the given arguments. This is used by the script engine to allow script writers to create objects using non-default constructors. If the given argument set is invalid for this object, this method should return NULL.

Parameters:
args The arguments for the object's constructor.
QObject * DzClassFactory::createInstance ( QScriptContext *  context  )  const [virtual]

Class factory function to create the class from DAZ Script. The default implementation collects the arguments from the given script context and calls DzClassFactory::createInstance( const QVariantList &args ) const.

Parameters:
context A pointer to the script context that is requesting the new object.
QMetaObject const * DzClassFactory::metaObject (  )  const
Returns:
The static meta object for the class type that this factory creates.
bool DzClassFactory::provides ( const char *  className  )  const
Parameters:
className The name of the class to check for inheritance of.
Returns:
true if the class created by this factory is of the given type or inherits a class of the given type.

Called to register the class with the scripting engine.
